## Project Scope

While working at **National Consultant**, I served as a Civil Engineer for the detailed design of the **Mechi Highway**, a major 124 KM four-lane corridor.

## Key Responsibilities

* **Geometric Design:** Designed horizontal and vertical alignments using **SW Roads** and **AutoCAD** ensuring compliance with DoR Standards.
* **Pavement Design:** Calculated structural requirements for heavy traffic loading.
* **Hydrology & Hazard:** Prepared hazard maps and hydrological studies for drainage design.

::: {.callout-note icon=false}
## Key Deliverables
* Detailed Project Report (DPR)
* Cost Estimates and Quantity Calculations (BOQ)
* Traffic Count & Axle Load Analysis
:::
